title: Did Denzel Washington Criticize Meryl Streep?
subtitle: Actor Denzel Washington said that making movies was a luxury, a comment that was unrelated to Meryl Streep's controversial 2017 Golden Globes speech.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Denzel Washington criticized Meryl Streep for making a political speech during the 2017 Golden Globes award ceremony.
